QuestData.Title: The Elder's Instruments
QuestData.Description: Oh dear, oh dear... The Elder mustn't find out!$B$BI must have left the Elder's ceremonial instruments behind during the escape.$B$BBut... Moonwater Retreat is crawling with hozen by now!$B$BWhat sort of Pearlkeeper am I, to have lost them so carelessly?$B$B<The old jinyu buries his face into his hands.>$B$BStranger, could you find it in your heart to help me?
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect the Waterspeaker's Staff, Ceremonial Robe, Jade Crown, and Rosewood Beads from Slingtail Stickypaws.
QuestData.CompletionText: The Elder is a Waterspeaker. He speaks to the waters, and they answer.
QuestData.RewardText: You found them? Oh thank the spirits of water!$B$BYou have saved my tailfin, $n.
